name: Super Red Rope Puzzles
description:
Super Red Rope Puzzles is a game where you will have to simply take a ball to a goal. This explanation is where the simple part of the game ends because you will find a bunch of challenging levels waiting for you to prove how skillful, clever and patient you are!

The development of this game was possible thanks to the great raylib library and some cool audio loops taken out of a song from Josh Penn-Pierson.

Now you can also choose to download a version with a simple level editor to modify the levels or create your own challenges!

Note: All levels are unlocked in this version to save your time. If you just want to play, download the version without the level editor.

Have fun and feel free to coment!
